jobDescription: This role is based at Agoda Bangkok office, full-time Are you looking for a unique opportunity to work at the cutting edge of marketing optimization? Would you want to work in a rapidly growing company with some of the sharpest minds in the industry? How about living in one of the worlds most beautiful countries, one top-rated by expats? Then Agoda is the place for you!  We are seeking top-notch candidates to own important marketing channels such as Search, Display, Agoda loyalty program, Mobile App marketing, discounting, and more. The head of marketing channel is a senior role overseeing a team or marketing managers responsible for over one or more of these areas, depending on the final outcome of the recruitment process.  The Agoda marketing department is highly data-driven and focused on developing and leveraging proprietary in-house tools to automate and scale marketing programs that maximize the lifetime value of Agoda customers through measurable marketing programs and channels. You will drive new strategies, idea generation, growth and development of products, as well as people. You will be in a senior manager role in our international digital marketing team and should be comfortable working with product managers, engineers, and teams ranging from finance to analytics. Because of the significant impact that these channels have on our overall business, you will have regular interaction with the senior management team, including COO, and CEO.  This role is based at Global Operations Office at Bangkok, Thailand. Full visa sponsorship and relocation assistance available for eligible candidates.Apply!
